H3.text: when did michael vick start playing for the eagles. 2009 NFL season

A4.text: Vick signed a one-year contract with the Philadelphia Eagles on August 13, 2009.

A5.text: After serving his sentence, Vick signed with the Philadelphia Eagles for the 2009 season.

A6.text: The Philadelphia Eagles named Michael Vick the starting quarterback going into the 2013 season.

A7.text: Vick spent six seasons with the Falcons before being sentenced to 21 months in prison for his involvement in an illegal interstate dog fighting ring.

A8.text: Vick won the NFL's Comeback Player of the Year Award in 2010 while playing for the Philadelphia Eagles.
